title: DirectX Error
body: Someone can help me? I formatted my pc because whenever I entered lol, the game was completely black. After the formatting, I reinstalled lol, but now it will not let me enter the game because it says I have a directx error. I installed the latest version but the problem still prevails. Does anyone know how to solve it?

replies.body: Hmmmm it sounds like that directx update might not have installed correctly. Double check that driver, and if that doesn't do the trick go through the rest of the steps in this [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) as well. Hit me back up if you're still getting that directx error.
